animeDescription: Hiyori's grandmother died. To stop her crying all day and every day, Hiyori's father built a humanoid robot called Washimo, that looks like her granny, complete with dentures. It walks faster than a snail but slower than a rhinoceros beetle; in fact, however, it can outrun a bullet train.  (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Imagawa Yasuhiro', ['Director', 'Screenplay']], ['Kosaka Satoru', ['Character Design']], ['Kondou Shinya', ['Director of Photography']]]
